ValidationRule.description: Count of Total Subcontracts must be greater than 0 to allow contract to be activated
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
ISCHANGED(Status), RecordType.Name = 'US Master', ISPICKVAL( Status, 'Activated'),
OR( NOT(ISPICKVAL( ApprovalStatus__c, 'Approved')), (FIN_TotalSubcontracts__c= 0 || FIN_TotalSubcontracts__c= null))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Wrong value of Approval Status or no Subcontracts
